languages.text: {n}Где-то во мраке слышится топоток чьих-то мелких лапок. Хейнрикс обрывает самого себя и крепко сжимает вашу ладонь в своей.{/n} "Зараза, нашел еще место для откровений... я подвергаю тебя опасности, задерживая здесь. Идем, {name}".

{n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Где-то во мраке слышится топоток чьих-то мелких лапок. Хейнрикс обрывает самого себя и крепко сжимает вашу ладонь в своей.{/n} "Зараза, нашел еще место для откровений... я подвергаю тебя опасности, задерживая здесь. Идем, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}En algún lugar de la oscuridad, oyes una serie de pequeñas pisadas. Heinrix se interrumpe y agarra con fuerza tu mano.{/n} «Maldita sea. Menudo lugar he elegido para mis confesiones... le pongo en peligro al retenerle aquí. Vamos, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}En algún lugar de la oscuridad, oyes una serie de pequeñas pisadas. Heinrix se interrumpe y agarra con fuerza tu mano.{/n} «Maldita sea. Menudo lugar he elegido para mis confesiones... le pongo en peligro al retenerle aquí. Vamos, {name}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}暗闇のどこかから、小さい足から発せられる柔らかい足音が聞こえる。ハインリックスは我に返り、こちらの手を強く握った。{/n}「クソ、なぜこんなところで懺悔したんだ…ここにいるとあなたの身が危ない。さあ、行こう、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}暗闇のどこかから、小さい足から発せられる柔らかい足音が聞こえる。ハインリックスは我に返り、こちらの手を強く握った。{/n}「クソ、なぜこんなところで懺悔したんだ…ここにいるとあなたの身が危ない。さあ、行こう、{name}」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你听到黑暗中的某处传来几不可闻的脚步声。海因里希没有再说下去，而是紧紧地握住了你的手。{/n}“该死，我怎么会在这种地方倾吐心声……再待下去你就有危险了。走吧，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到黑暗中的某处传来几不可闻的脚步声。海因里希没有再说下去，而是紧紧地握住了你的手。{/n}“该死，我怎么会在这种地方倾吐心声……再待下去你就有危险了。走吧，{name}。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez le bruit discret de petits pieds dans les ténèbres. Heinrix s'interrompt et serre votre main dans la sienne.{/n} « Bon sang, j'ai bien choisi mon endroit pour confesser... Je vous mets en danger en vous retenant ici. Venez, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez le bruit discret de petits pieds dans les ténèbres. Heinrix s'interrompt et serre votre main dans la sienne.{/n} « Bon sang, j'ai bien choisi mon endroit pour confesser... Je vous mets en danger en vous retenant ici. Venez, {name}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Irgendwo in der Dunkelheit kannst du das leise Tappen kleiner Füße hören. Heinrix unterbricht sich und umschließt fest deine Hand.{/n} "Verdammt, da habe ich mir ja ein schönes Fleckchen für meine Beichte ausgesucht ... Ich bringe Euch in Gefahr, indem ich Euch hier halte. Kommt, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendwo in der Dunkelheit kannst du das leise Tappen kleiner Füße hören. Heinrix unterbricht sich und umschließt fest deine Hand.{/n} "Verdammt, da habe ich mir ja ein schönes Fleckchen für meine Beichte ausgesucht ... Ich bringe Euch in Gefahr, indem ich Euch hier halte. Kommt, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Karanlığın içinde bir yerlerden ufak bir ayağın yere hafifçe vuruşunu duyabiliyorsun. Konuşmayı kesen Heinrix, elini avuçlarının içine alarak sıkı sıkıya tutuyor.{/n} "Kahretsin, itiraflarım için ne de güzel bir yer seçmişim. Seni burada tutarak tehlikeye atıyorum. Gel hadi {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhere in the darkness you can hear the soft thudding of small feet. Heinrix cuts himself off and grips your hand tightly in his.{/n} "Damn it, a fine place I've picked for my confessions... I'm putting you in danger by keeping you here. Come on, {name}."
